hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Skull Kid# grants #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #the Market# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bottom of the Well Compass#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 3 Top

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ice Trap#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs #Dampé's Hut#.
